revised_title: On the Invariants, Covariants, and Contravariants of a Quaternary Cubic
tldr: The author, George Salmon, attempts to enumerate the invariants, covariants, and contravariants of a quaternary cubic, which represents a surface of the third order. He provides a detailed analysis of the discriminant and reciprocant of a quaternary quadric and explores the Hessian of a cubic. Additionally, he introduces new concomitant functions and forms tables of important results.
